hints.favorites_as_blocks: Display favorites as big blocks instead of lines
hints.activity_disabled: Do not display activity in main menu
hints.history_disabled: Do not display history in Activity menu
hints.replies_on_top: Replies chain will be on top instead of center
hints.disable_autoturn: Do not auto turn screen in threads, but keep it for media
hints.absolute_time: Always display time in format like 01.12.2020 00:02:05 instead of '5 hours ago'
hints.time_at_right: Move time from bottom to top of the post's info
hints.hide_my_posts: Do not mark your posts as (Y)
hints.fav_on_reply_disabled: Do not add thread to favorites if you replied
hints.back_to_thread_disabled: Do not close replies chain in the thread after your reply
hints.right_menu: Show thread menu at the right
hints.bottom_menu: Show thread menu at the bottom
hints.show_extension: Show extensions for media files: .jpg, .png, .webm and so on

help.replies:
Swipe down to close all replies.

Swipe left or tap on empty space to close current reply.
help.post_form: If you need to move markup buttons, just swipe them down or up.
help.thread:
Swipe right to open favorites.

Tap on thread title or menu bar to scroll to top.

Tap on post id to copy link or mark post

paranoia_mode: ALL server features will be disabled, including new version check. Developer won't receive any crash reports and usage stats, and server push notifications on replies will be disabled.
